code: import axios from'axios';const axiosInstance=axios.create({baseURL:'https://api.youtubetranscript.live/api',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});axiosInstance.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('authToken');if(token){config.headers.Authorization=`Bearer ${token}`;}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});export default axiosInstance;
